translated: Why would I want to go there alone?

original: Confirmez votre réservation à l'avance.
translated: Confirm your reservation in advance.

original: Tom a demandé à Mary si elle l'aimait bien.
translated: Tom asked Mary whether she liked him.

original: Je crois que je comprends ce que Tom essaie de dire.
translated: I think that I understand what Tom's trying to say.

original: Je ne suis pas le seul à avoir faim.
translated: I'm not the only one who's hungry.

original: Tous les humains sur Terre sont issus d'un ancêtre commun.
translated: All humans on Earth are descended from a common ancestor.

original: Ce livre appartient à Tony.
translated: This book belongs to Tony.

original: Comment t'appelles-tu ?
translated: What's your name?

original: J'ai la gorge sèche.
translated: My throat is parched.

original: Elle aime la maitresse.
translated: She likes the teacher.

original: Nous nous faisions du souci.
translated: We were worried.

original: Elles ont traversé la rue.
translated: They've crossed the street.

original: Notre appartement est trop petit, il n'y a pas d'espace pour élever une famille.
translated: Our apartment is too small. There's not enough room to raise a family.

original: Tu devrais te l'acheter.
translated: You should buy it for yourself.

original: Ce n'est pas la mienne.
translated: This isn't mine.

original: Il ne me fallait pas y aller.
translated: I didn't have to go.

original: J'allumai la chandelle.
translated: I lit the candle.

original: Ils ne savent pas comment le faire.
translated: They do not know how to do it.

original: Pourquoi êtes-vous agacées ?
translated: Why are you upset?

original: Elle est toujours occupée en semaine.
translated: She's always busy on weekdays.

original: Ça n'arrivera pas.
translated: That ain't going to happen.

original: Elle est là pour me tenir compagnie pendant que je suis en convalescence.
translated: She is here to keep me company while I’m still recovering.

original: Je serai dans le camion.
translated: I'll be in the truck.

original: Le guerrier connaît à la fois ses forces et ses faiblesses.
translated: The warrior is conscious of both his strength and his weakness.

original: Nous n'allons pas y parvenir.
translated: We're not gonna make it.

original: Es-tu sûre de ne pas vouloir la garder ?
translated: Are you sure you don't want to keep it?

original: Nous devrions le faire parce que c'est juste.
translated: We should do it, because it's right.

original: Y a-t-il quoi que ce soit que je puisse faire pour toi ?
translated: Is there anything that I can do for you?

original: Que dirais-tu d'arrêter pour aujourd'hui ?
translated: How about calling it a day?

original: Un vieil homme se reposait sous l'arbre.
translated: An old man was at rest under the tree.

original: On ne sait pas ce que Tom devient.
translated: We haven't heard from Tom in a while.

original: Nous attendions en retenant notre souffle.
translated: We were waiting with bated breath.

original: Ce village n'est pas affecté par la pollution de l'air.
translated: This village is free from air pollution.

original: Tu as toujours été une bonne danseuse.
translated: You always were a good dancer.

original: Marie n'avait jamais embrassé quelqu'un auparavant.
translated: Mary had never kissed anyone before.

original: Il ne nous aime pas.
translated: He doesn't like us.

original: Voyons si on peut t'aider.
translated: Let's see if we can help you.

original: Quel numéro de bus dois-je prendre pour aller à Waikiki ?
translated: What number bus do I take to get to Waikiki?

original: Ne soyez pas si borné !
translated: Don't be so narrow-minded!

original: Puis-je avoir l'attention de tout le monde, je vous prie ?
translated: May I have everyone's attention, please?

original: Nous n'allons pas faire ça.
translated: We won't be doing that.

original: C'est une grosse affaire.
translated: This is a big deal.

original: Sami était attiré par la nature douce et simple de Layla.
translated: Sami was drawn to Layla's sweet, simple nature.
